sentences.english: Shapeshifting will no longer cancel Water Walking.

sentences.chinese: 哈维的朋友从未去过水上世界。

sentences.english: With 11)rustling feathers, they swam lightly over the water.
sentences.chinese: 他们轻飘飘地浮在水上，羽毛发出飕飕的响声。

sentences.english: Full use of all non-motorised water sports and all associated equipment.
sentences.chinese: 充分利用所有非机动水上运动和所有相关设备。

sentences.english: Thus, ice floats on water and a body of water freezes from the top down.
sentences.chinese: 因此，冰浮在水上，水体从上向下冻结。

sentences.english: Then they got into the seaplane.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们去了水上飞机。

sentences.english: Was that a yellow and white Cessna 206 seaplane?
sentences.chinese: 是黄白色的塞斯纳206水上飞机吗？

sentences.english: For example swimming and water polo are disciplines of the sport Aquatics.
sentences.chinese: 比如游泳和水球都是水上运动的分项。

sentences.english: Wuhan"is delighted for frain", the Shui Shang wedding, attract to come to genius and beauty absolutely myriad.

sentences.english: Assigns the movement to formulate every four years by the water ballet movement Technical committee.
sentences.chinese: 指定动作每四年由水上芭蕾运动技术委员会重新制定。

sentences.english: There are loads of water sports on offer at Dadonghai.
sentences.chinese: 大东海的水上运动项目特别多。

sentences.english: She would be able to launch seaplanes by using light jettisonable trolleys .
sentences.chinese: 它能用轻便的抛射推车发射水上飞机。

sentences.english: Chapter five is t the point-setting principle of the aquatic oil station and the suggestion to the navigation environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 第五章为水上加油站设置原则和通航环境保护建议。

sentences.english: Dale and Becky are negotiating the price with Bo, the man who rents Jet Skis.
sentences.chinese: 戴尔和贝齐正跟海边租水上摩托车的阿宝议价。

sentences.english: Seaplane mainly responsible for the airport to distant island transportation service.
sentences.chinese: 水上飞机主要负责机场到较远岛屿的接送。

sentences.english: You will find several floating restaurants in Aberdeen.
sentences.chinese: 在香港仔区，你还能找到几家水上餐厅。
